The heavy cloak feels oily and has a faint chemical smell.

Neck Slot: Uncommon

Enhancement Bonus: Fortitude, Reflex, and Will

Property:

Whenever you roll a natural 1 on an attack roll or a saving throw, you take ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends). You can end this effect by removing the cloak as a minor action.

Level 15 or 20: Ongoing 15 poison damage.

Level 25 or 30: Ongoing 20 poison damage,
